title: Da, Da Ge Da Xigua
synopsis: When the two heads of the Black Plum Blossom Country and the Heart Country divided their territories, they belonged to a small island. They eventually broke their skin at the negotiation table, and the two sides launched a full-scale war on the three fronts of sea, land and air. In an air force battle, the pilots of the Black Plum Blossom Country met the pilots of the Heart Country. The two had a life-and-death contest at an altitude of 10,000 meters. The two aircraft fell to the ground during the fierce battle. The two were accidentally tied to the same parachute. Only then was able to escape. When the two found out that they were living on an uninhabited desert island, they could only put down their butcher knives and turn their fighting into jade silk. On the deserted island far away from gunpowder, they forgot about war and pain, and only lived in peace and freedom. But the war did not leave them. One day, the two witnessed a large-scale naval battle between the two countries on the nearby sea. The two had doubts about the meaning of the war. When the rescue team from the third country of spades came to the small island, The two chose...(translated from douban)
